mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_inspection_record (`name`, user_id, place_id, property_flags, place_ids, property_types, progress, step, total, patrolled, status_equipment_total, status_equipment_online, status_equipment_offline, warning_equipment_total, warning_equipment_abnormal, fault_equipment_total, fault_equipment_abnormal, `status`, error_reason, start_time, end_time, duration, `method`) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{placeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyFlags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{progress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patrolled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusEquipmentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusEquipmentOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusEquipmentOffline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warningEquipmentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warningEquipmentAbnormal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faultEquipmentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{faultEquipmentAbnormal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errorReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_inspection_record set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, place_id = #{placeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, property_flags = #{propertyFlags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place_ids = #{placeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, property_types = #{propertyTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, progress = #{progress,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, step = #{step,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patrolled = #{patrolled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_equipment_total = #{statusEquipmentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_equipment_online = #{statusEquipmentOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_equipment_offline = #{statusEquipmentOffline,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warning_equipment_total = #{warningEquipmentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, warning_equipment_abnormal = #{warningEquipmentAbnormal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fault_equipment_total = #{faultEquipmentTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fault_equipment_abnormal = #{faultEquipmentAbnormal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, error_reason = #{errorReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, user_id, place_id, property_flags, place_ids, property_types, progress, step, total, patrolled, status_equipment_total, status_equipment_online, status_equipment_offline, warning_equipment_total, warning_equipment_abnormal, fault_equipment_total, fault_equipment_abnormal, `status`, error_reason, start_time, end_time, duration, `method`, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from tb_inspection_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, `name`, user_id, place_id, property_flags, place_ids, property_types, progress, step, total, patrolled, status_equipment_total, status_equipment_online, status_equipment_offline, warning_equipment_total, warning_equipment_abnormal, fault_equipment_total, fault_equipment_abnormal, `status`, error_reason, start_time, end_time, duration, `method`, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from tb_inspection_record
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_inspection_record SET step=#{step} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tb_inspection_record record
FIND_IN_SET(record.`status`, #{statuses})
AND record.start_time >= #{startTime}
AND record.start_time <= #{endTime}
AND FIND_IN_SET(record.user_id, #{userIds})
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{like} ,'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(record.`status`, #{excludeStatuses}) = 0
